Package de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.main.gui.util

GUI utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClipboardHandler
    Clipboard Handler to easily copy given words from a text.
    GUIFormat
    Base class for all GUI windows for formatting.
    GUIWorker<T,V>
    Worker thread for GUI based worker tasks.
    HighlightData
    Class for storing data to be highlighted.
    InTreeNode
    Created by timo on 10/22/14.
    JToolTipArea
    JTextArea extended with a tooltip and coloring extension.
    LeafNode
    LeafNode implementation for grammar trees.
    POSInBox
    Represents a text to be displayed in a box of a given size.
    SampleTreeFactory
    Creates "Sample" trees, e.g.
    SwingDemo
    Demonstrates how to use the TreeLayout to render a tree in a Swing application.
    TableModel
    Table model for displaying statistics.
    TableRenderer
    Table renderer dealing with appropriate coloring of columns and cells.
    TextInBoxNodeExtentProvider
    A NodeExtentProvider for nodes of type POSInBox.
    TextInBoxTreePane
    A JComponent displaying a tree of TextInBoxes, given by a TreeLayout.
    TextLineNumber
    This class will display line numbers for a related text component.
    UTF8Bundle
    Implements handling of UTF-8 encoded resourse bundles.
